---
title: "Resources"
---

## Purpose
- Curate links to program documents, templates, tooling, and training that support HRL data governance commitments.

## Core documents
- HRL Data Governance and Management Plan, Science Committee Charter, science plans, and governance decisions.
- Key site pages (Program Overview, Governance & Roles, Commitments) for foundational context.

## Technical resources
- HRL GitHub organization, Style & Development Guide, metadata standards, schema/vocabulary registries.
- Data catalog, APIs, SDKs, and infrastructure documentation for accessing curated datasets.

## Training and support
- Onboarding modules, recorded demos, workshops, and office hour schedules.
- Contact information for Central Data Team, metadata leads, and governance liaisons.

## Contribution and feedback
- Instructions for proposing new resources, reporting broken links, or requesting updates.
- Pointers to issue trackers or forms used to manage resource inventory.
